name: Harness Racing
description:
Harness Racing is the premiere interactive 3D horse racing application in mobile gaming. Unlike most horse racing applications, you control the action from start to finish. Here you get an opportunity to race against other opponents.This fun game is family-friendly and enjoyed by people of any age.But this game will require you to show top skills in steering the horse
- Fun for all ages!
- Fun for hours!
- Easy tilt controls!
All the horses are ready!
Are you Ready?
Enjoy the game.
